user_instruction: 'Send an email to Sarah (sarah@cognitivegrowth.org) summarizing our latest discussion on therapy methods. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi there,

Could you please pull the notes from John’s most recent discussion on modern therapy methods in his Notion workspace and send them my way? I’d like to use those details to draft an accurate summary email to Sarah (sarah@cognitivegrowth.org).

Thanks so much for your help!

Best,
[Your Name]

final_output:
